channel.title: Comments on: Vanilla Slice – Daring Bakers Challenge October 2012

item.title: By: Natasha
item.dc:creator: Natasha
item.description:
Thanks so much for this recipe, I've just finished the final touches of the vanilla slice... Now Gona sleep and I look forward to digging in! I did need a lot more flour coz when I added the water it was so runny.. It may have been my bad measuring skills. Thanks again I hope my baking turns out like yours..
Really appreciate your recipe
item.content:encoded:
Thanks so much for this recipe, I’ve just finished the final touches of the vanilla slice… Now Gona sleep and I look forward to digging in! I did need a lot more flour coz when I added the water it was so runny.. It may have been my bad measuring skills. Thanks again I hope my baking turns out like yours..

Really appreciate your recipe

item.title: By: Nic@diningwithastud
item.dc:creator: Nic@diningwithastud
item.description: Gorgeous layers :D I love vanilla slice. My grandmother would always make it when I was little. Such a great dessert
item.content:encoded: Gorgeous layers ðŸ˜€ I love vanilla slice. My grandmother would always make it when I was little. Such a great dessert

item.title: By: Jenni
item.dc:creator: Jenni
item.description: Beautiful Napleons! I love the thin slices, but I think I mostly love the frosting dripping over the edge! Gorgeous! :)
item.content:encoded: Beautiful Napleons! I love the thin slices, but I think I mostly love the frosting dripping over the edge! Gorgeous! ðŸ™‚
